text: kavurun allah veta dun poronduva -eya sthira kala pasuda- kada karannoda ovuntada, kavurun allah ekarasi kara tabana lesata ana karana læbu dæya venkara damannoda ovuntada, kavurun bhumiyehi aparadha karamin særi sarannoda ovuntada, (deviyange) sapayama at vanu æta. tavada ovunta itamat napuru nivesada (piliyela kara) ætteya
